header.description: Electronic engineering, passionate about web development

about-me.title: About me
about-me.description: I enjoy working in a team and have been part of various projects as both a frontend and full-stack developer. I'm constantly researching new technologies and seeking out new challenges for professional growth and learning.

list.summary: The website features an attractive interface thanks to the implementation of layout components with TailwindCSS and Sass. The combination of these tools allowed for the creation of a responsive and elegant design, adapting to different device sizes.

The platform is a comprehensive tool that provides exhaustive information about the research group, its members, and its initiatives. I worked closely with the developers to ensure the website meets their requirements and expectations.
